ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: New to EQ and can't get it started!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Eek. You might not want to put a housefan that close to your computer. Fans that size have an electromagnetic field that can cause problems. Some fans can
ygData.messageBody:
> I'm going to try them on monday.
> BTW I did try using a 16" housefan directed into the open case- no
> change in symptoms.
> I just know that the cause is going to be the same as most other
> probs so far: drivers. I've tried to update them, nvidea is updated
> (signed and everything!!) but the 4in1 and av97 8233 onboard sound
> drivers don't want to load right.
> Thanks for the replys!!
>
Eek. You might not want to put a housefan that close to your computer. Fans
that size have an electromagnetic field that can cause problems. Some fans
can disrupt monitors if too close. It can even erase or corrupt data on your
harddrive. It's best to use a device specifically designed for use with a
computer rather than something like that.
luv,
-Su
